definitions: To strike or beat (a person or animal) with a whip or similar implement.
To move or take something out suddenly and quickly.
To beat (cream, eggs, etc.) with a whisk or similar implement until stiff or frothy.
To defeat (an opponent or team) comprehensively.
To make or achieve something very quickly or suddenly.
examples: He used to whip his horses to make them go faster.
She whipped out her phone to take a picture.
Whip the cream until it forms stiff peaks.
Our team whipped the competition in the final game.
Can you whip up a quick dinner?
